Package: org.grails.datastore.mapping.model.config

[Java] Class GormMappingConfigurationStrategy

    • org.grails.datastore.mapping.model.config.GormMappingConfigurationStrategy
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      MappingConfigurationStrategy

      @java.lang.SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes", "unchecked"})
public class GormMappingConfigurationStrategy
extends java.lang.Object

      This implementation of the MappingConfigurationStrategy interface will interpret GORM-style syntax for defining entities and associations.

      Example in Groovy code:

        
      class Author {
          String name
          static hasMany = [books:Book]
      }
      class Book {
         String title
         static belongsTo = [author:Author]
        }
      Authors:
      Graeme Rocher
      Since:
      1.0
